data.title: Sony and Microsoft Struggle With New Console Demand
data.text: Tech giants Sony Corp. (NYSE:SNE) and Microsoft Corp. (NASDAQ:MSFT) have released their competing, next generation consoles into a market where demand far exceeds supply.

data.title: Microsoft joins new industry alliance aimed at advancing DNA data storage systems
data.text: Microsoft is teaming up with other companies to form an alliance to advance the field of DNA data storage, which promises to revolutionize the way vital records are kept for the long haul.

data.title: Videogames Sales Hit New High in Q3: 4 Stocks to Buy
data.text: Microsoft (MSFT), Nintendo (NTDOY) and Activision Blizzard (ATVI) have sold a record number of videogames this year and are likely to be big gainers in the fourth quarter too.
